venue.address_1: UMass-JFK T Stop/Moakley Columbus Park, Intersection of Columbia Rd., Morrissey Blvd. and Day Blvd.
venue.name: Moakley Columbus Park

item.description: On August 1 from 7-9 AM at the Columbus Moakley Park rotary, near the UMass-JFK redline MBTA station, we will standout and sign wave at this very busy morning commute route. An added bonus for this standout-signwave location is the opportunity to demonstrate public support for Ron Paul to the Boston Globe newspaper located right down the street on Morrissey Blvd. Plenty of signs available for everyone! Let's make this first very public Ron Paul event a great success with a good turnout! At UMass MBTA stop exit at the upper level on Columbia Road. Map of location (Columbus-Moakley Park at intersection of Columbia, Morrissey Blvd and Day Blvd.) Map of 1000 Columbia Rd South Boston, MA 02127-3902, US Note: Rotary is just to the south of red star on map. For more info: Joe at 617 436-0320
item.name: Dorchester-South Boston Morning Standout/Sign Wave
